Component.text: Installs a single Library (.hr1 File), first select the Library you want to unpack, then navigate to the directory in which you wish to store the samples and other data.

Installs all of the available Libraries (.hr1 Files) inside a chosen directory. First select the directory containing the Libraries, then navigate to the directory in which you wish to store the samples and other data.
